resources.string: Every single Sunday begins with pancakes… and ends with leftover pancakes from the morning. These are everything you want in a pancake. They’re soft and so fluffy… each mouthful melts in your mouth… you\'ll be reaching for more than one.

It\'s hard to resist a freshly blended fresh fruit smoothie. They\'re sweet, cold, and easy to make. Even if you don\'t always have the time to\ pull out the blender, you have to love a great-tasting smoothie!
